official_title: A bill to amend the Atomic Energy Act of 1954 with respect to the prices charged by the Federal Government for uranium enrichment services.

summary.text: Amends the Atomic Energy Act of 1954 to provide that any contract entered into by the Department of Energy for the producing or enriching of special nuclear fuel shall provide that no change in price for uranium enrichment services shall permit the recovery of revenues greater than the sum of all Government costs and normal and ordinary business expenses. Revises the procedure for giving congress notification of any change in enrichment services prices under this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Atomic Energy Act of 1954 with respect to the prices charged by the Federal Government for uranium enrichment services.
